articles.title: ‘Bye Bridget’: Somerville bakery claps back at internet ‘troll’ with a line of merch
articles.description:
“We don't need that here. That's not the attitude we want here. That's not the space we want to create, so goodbye," recalled Natalie Hug, the owner of Hearth & Hug Bakery.

The post ‘Bye Bridget’: Somerville bakery claps back at internet ‘troll’ with a line of merch appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Hearth & Hug Bakery in Somerville launched merchandise in response to online trolling.
Owner Natalie Hug emphasized creating a positive space for the community.
Local residents can now support the bakery's message through new merchandise.

articles.title: ‘Keep their light on in our world’: Daughter remembers Eastham couple who fell through ice
articles.description:
The couple died Feb. 14 after they fell through the ice at Bee’s River in Eastham while walking their black lab.

The post ‘Keep their light on in our world’: Daughter remembers Eastham couple who fell through ice appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Eastham couple fell through ice at Bee’s River on February 14 while walking their dog.
The couple's daughter honors their memory, emphasizing their lasting impact on the community.
Tragic incident raises awareness about ice safety for local residents and pet owners.

articles.title: 3 fires being investigated as arson in Fitchburg, officials say
articles.description:
“We’ve reached the point where we can confidently say that they were intentionally set,” State Fire Marshal Jon Davine said.

The post 3 fires being investigated as arson in Fitchburg, officials say appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Three fires in Fitchburg are confirmed as arson by State Fire Marshal Jon Davine.
Investigations are ongoing to identify suspects responsible for the intentionally set fires.
Local residents may face increased fire safety measures and community vigilance.

articles.title: Eric Dane, ‘Grey’s Anatomy’ star and ALS awareness advocate, dies at 53
articles.description:
His representatives said Dane died from amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, known also as Lou Gehrig’s disease, less than a year after he announced his diagnosis.

The post Eric Dane, ‘Grey’s Anatomy’ star and ALS awareness advocate, dies at 53 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Eric Dane, known for 'Grey's Anatomy', died at 53 from ALS.
Dane announced his ALS diagnosis less than a year before his death.
His advocacy raised awareness for ALS, impacting Boston's health community.
